title: Why Facebook Might Leave the EU
itunes:title: Why Facebook Might Leave the EU
description:
Mark Zuckerberg has said that Facebook and Instagram might have to shut down operations if there's not a change to EU privacy requirements. It turns out that's not a threat, it's a cry for help. We learn about what might force these platforms out of the EU.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Mark Zuckerberg has said that Facebook and Instagram might have to shut down operations if there's not a change to EU privacy requirements. It turns out that's not a threat, it's a cry for help. We learn about what might force these platforms out of the EU.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Safe Harbour, Privacy Shield, Trans-Atlantic Data Privacy Framework, GDPR, Data Protection Directive, European Union, EU, European Commission, Ireland, DPC, Data Protection Commission, Meta, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, data, privacy, security, surveillance
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
